title: Freight and Freight Handling
content:
Freight and Freight Handling

State Regulations
§ 1225.21 - Hours during which freight handling service available
§ 1225.22 - Improperly packaged, marked, leaking or loose freight not accepted for handling
§ 1225.23 - Freight subject to I.C.C. regulations not handled unless in compliance with such regulations
§ 1225.24 - Freight having an offensive odor or likely to damage other freight or make any portion of the terminal untenantable subject to immediate removal
§ 1225.25 - Accompaniment by Port Authority employee required for entry into certain areas
§ 1225.26 - Persons having business on terminal platforms may enter and remain only as long as their business requires
§ 1225.27 - Shippers, consignees and connecting carriers to use berth space designated by superintendent

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
